segments.text: I called the electronics shop to find out what time they close , and it took me twenty minutes to get what I wanted !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Twenty minutes just to find out what their business hours are ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: yes.They have some sort of digital receptionist.So when I called in , a machine told me to push a button for the department I wanted to be transferred to .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I hate getting voicemail instead of a person.What did you do ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I just kept pushing buttons . I was transferred to customer service , but there a machine told me to choose between technical help , warranty information , or price information .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Couldn ’ d you choose to be transferred to a real person ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Eventually I did get to a real person . I found out the closing time , but by then the store had already closed !
segments.speaker: S1
